mapper.select: select SID, CATEGORYID, CATEGORY, KEYWORDID, KEYWORD, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, EBAYITEMID, UPDATETIME, CREATETIME, EBAYSORT, KEYWORDFLAG, CATEGORYFLAG, SHOPFLAG, KEYWORDTOTAL, CATEGORYTOTAL, SHOPTOTAL, FLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, FIRSTDOWNTIME, ITEMFLAG, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from db_resultdetail where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, CATEGORYID, CATEGORY, KEYWORDID, KEYWORD, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, EBAYITEMID, UPDATETIME, CREATETIME, EBAYSORT, KEYWORDFLAG, CATEGORYFLAG, SHOPFLAG, KEYWORDTOTAL, CATEGORYTOTAL, SHOPTOTAL, FLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, FIRSTDOWNTIME, ITEMFLAG, RESERVE3, RESERVE4 from db_resultdetail
mapper.sql: SID , CATEGORYID , CATEGORY , KEYWORDID , KEYWORD , SHOPID , SHOPNAME , EBAYITEMID , UPDATETIME , CREATETIME , EBAYSORT , KEYWORDFLAG , CATEGORYFLAG , SHOPFLAG , KEYWORDTOTAL , CATEGORYTOTAL , SHOPTOTAL , FLAG , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE5 , RESERVE6 , RESERVE7 , RESERVE8 , RESERVE9 , RESERVE10 , FIRSTDOWNTIME , ITEMFLAG , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4

SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
KEYWORDID = #{keywordid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
KEYWORD = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EBAYITEMID = #{ebayitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
EBAYSORT = #{ebaysort,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
KEYWORDFLAG = #{keywordflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CATEGORYFLAG = #{categoryflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SHOPFLAG = #{shopflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
KEYWORDTOTAL = #{keywordtotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CATEGORYTOTAL = #{categorytotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SHOPTOTAL = #{shoptotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE7 = #{reserve7,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE8 = #{reserve8,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE9 = #{reserve9,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE10 = #{reserve10,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FIRSTDOWNTIME = #{firstdowntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ITEMFLAG = #{itemflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
